nodes.text: The HXI-54 Juggernaut was a battle droid stationed aboard the Republic Navy's Thranta-class corvette Dorin's Sky. During the Galactic War, the Dorin's Sky was boarded by the reconstituted Sith Empire, and the HXI-54 Juggernaut was destroyed in the battle.
The HXI-54 Juggernaut appears as one of the bosses in the Boarding Party Flashpoint appearing in the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic.
